name: Big Spook Street
description:
It's the spookiest time of year, but everyone seems to be staying indoors...

Which means all the candy is yours for the taking!

Use WASD to run to those doors and get all their sweet treats!

Wear your mask with Left Click to see and collect candy.

Run with Left Shift to get to those front doors faster; you do have a curfew, after all.

Jump with Space like all young children do.

Collect enough candy to stuff yourself silly and be home before bed time!

Note: For performance reasons, we recommend downloading and playing the Windows version.
